alert.note: Alert for Bell; Breathitt; Clay; Harlan; Knox; Leslie; Magoffin; Owsley; Perry; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:09PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Harlan, Bell, Knox, eastern Owsley, Leslie, northwestern Perry, southeastern Whitley, Breathitt, central Magoffin and Clay Counties through 245 PM EST... At 208 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lucky Fork to Spurlock to Ogle to Old Flat Lick to Pearl. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Buckhorn, Crockettsville, Panco, Talbert, Jacks Creek, Plank, Brutus, Beech, Sizerock and Sebastian`s Branch around 215 PM EST. Whick, Creekville, Saul, Spring Creek, Little, Saldee, Wolf Coal, Copland, Marcum and Howard Creek around 220 PM EST. Beverly, Watts, Sandy Fork, Ferndale, Clayhole, Buckhorn Lake S.P., Shoal, Lost Creek, Gardner and Confluence around 225 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pineville, Hosea, Krypton, Warbranch, Ponza, Calvin, Hardshell, East Pineville, Chavies, Varilla, Hyden, Mozelle, Miracle, Callaway, Balkan, Lamont, Wendover, Oaks, Asher, Sikes, Daisydell, Dice, Wooton, Blackmont, Chappell, Black Snake, Molus, Avawam, Lambric, Rowdy, Hazard, Loyall, Wallins Creek, Big Fork, Coldiron, Causey, Kentenia, Frew, Yeaddiss and Tremont. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 17 and 59. Kentucky Highway 80 in Perry County between mile markers 9 and 10. U.S. Highway 25 East in Bell County between mile markers 1 and 18. U.S. Highway 25 East in Knox County between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bell; Breathitt; Clay; Harlan; Knox; Leslie; Magoffin; Owsley; Perry; Whitley
